author: Staff Reporter
text:
Justice D. Hariparanthaman, Madras High Court judge, who retired on Wednesday last was felicitated by a group of advocates, in an event organised on Monday in the Bar Council Building.

Speeches were delivered by various dignitaries, including veteran leader of Communist Party of India R. Nallakannu, Human Rights activist A. Marx, and film director S.P. Jananathan.

During the event, retired Justice Hariparanthaman, who came in a dothi refused to accept a mega-sized garland offered by the lawyers, saying that he could not accept such “honours” which were meant for kings or persons aspiring to attain such position.
title: Retired High Court judge felicitated
